alert.note: Alert for Pettis (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 8:17PM CDT until August 04 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Pettis County in central Missouri... * Until 845 PM CDT. * At 817 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles east of Houstonia, or 10 miles north of Sedalia, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hughesville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
